name: nodejs-crud
description: ![NodeJS_CRUD_ERDiagram](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/221359d6-2ef3-492b-ad8e-6ca317430ad8) ```SQL CREATE TABLE `user` (   `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL,   `address` varchar(100) NOT NULL,   `phone-number` varchar(100) NOT NULL,   `user_id` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci NOT NULL,   `pw_hash` varchar(100) NOT NULL,   PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
